Package wei.task

Class TaskController

  • java.lang.Object
    • wei.task.TaskController
  • public class TaskController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the Task Manager Controller which interacts with user,user can input commands, Task Manager Controller call the methods in Task Manager e.g. add new task, update a task,print the task, remove a task, etc.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wei Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TaskController()
      Constructs a TaskManager, load tasks from the file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addTask()
      Add a task to the arraylist, user can define task name, project name and due time.
      void EditTask()
      Edit a task of the arraylist, user can modify task name, project, and change status, due time.
      void filterAProject()
      Show tasks by project name, user can specify the project name which he wants to filter.
      int getDoneTaskNumber()
      Return the number of the done tasks in the list.
      int getInt​(java.lang.String inputHint, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Get a legal input id from user, if the input is invalid, wait until user input a legal integer.
      int getUndoTaskNumber()
      Return the number of the undo tasks in the list.
      void removeTask()
      Delete a task from the list, user can specify the task id as an index.
      void saveTaskList()
      Write objects into a file, use java Serializable to implement writing objects into a binary file.
      void showTaskByTime()
      Show all the tasks order by create time.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskController

        public TaskController()
        Constructs a TaskManager, load tasks from the file.

    • Method Detail

      • addTask

        public void addTask()
        Add a task to the arraylist, user can define task name, project name and due time. the status has a default value of "undo".

      • EditTask

        public void EditTask()
        Edit a task of the arraylist, user can modify task name, project, and change status, due time.

      • filterAProject

        public void filterAProject()
        Show tasks by project name, user can specify the project name which he wants to filter.

      • getDoneTaskNumber

        public int getDoneTaskNumber()
        Return the number of the done tasks in the list.
        Returns:
        The number of the done tasks in the arrayList

      • getInt

        public int getInt​(java.lang.String inputHint,
                  java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Get a legal input id from user, if the input is invalid, wait until user input a legal integer.
        Parameters:
        inputHint - input information
        errorMessage - error information when the reading fails
        Returns:
        user input id

      • getUndoTaskNumber

        public int getUndoTaskNumber()
        Return the number of the undo tasks in the list.
        Returns:
        The number of the undo tasks in the arrayList

      • removeTask

        public void removeTask()
        Delete a task from the list, user can specify the task id as an index.

      • saveTaskList

        public void saveTaskList()
        Write objects into a file, use java Serializable to implement writing objects into a binary file.

      • showTaskByTime

        public void showTaskByTime()
        Show all the tasks order by create time.
